title: Update a documentation pull request
contents:
mode_edit

更新文件 Pull Requestlink

Update a documentation pull requestlink

本主題介紹如何響應測試失敗和對你的 Pull Request 的反饋。

This topic describes how to respond to test failures and feedback on your pull request.

在你開啟 Pull Request 後，它會被測試和審查。獲得批准後，這些更改會合併到 angular/angular 中，併成為 Angular 文件的一部分。

After you open a pull request, it is tested and reviewed. After it's approved, the changes are merged into angular/angular and they become part of the Angular documentation.

雖然某些 Pull Request 會在你沒有進一步操作的情況下獲得批准，但大多數 Pull Request 都會收到需要你進行更改的反饋。

While some pull requests are approved with no further action on your part, most pull requests receive feedback that requires you to make a change.

Pull Request 的剖析link

Anatomy of a pull requestlink

開啟 Pull Request 後，Pull Request 頁面會記錄 Pull Request 中的活動，因為它被檢視、更新和批准。這是 Pull Request 頁面頂部的範例，後跟其包含的資訊的描述。

After you open a pull request, the pull request page records the activity on the pull request as it is reviewed, updated, and approved. This is an example of the top of a pull request page followed by a description of the information it contains.

Pull-request 選項卡上方是 Pull Request 的摘要，包括：

Above the pull-request tabs is a summary of the pull request that includes:

  • Pull Request 標題和索引

    The pull request title and index

  • 拉取請求的狀態：開啟或關閉

    The status of the pull request: open or closed

  • 具有更改的分支和要更新的分支的描述

    A description of the branch with the changes and the branch to update

這些選項卡包含 Pull Request 的不同方面。

The tabs contain different aspects of the pull request.

  • 對話

    Conversation

    對 Pull Request、系統訊息以及自動測試和批准的摘要的所有註釋和更改。

    All comments and changes to the pull request, system messages, and a summary of the automated tests and approvals.

  • 提交

    Commits

    此 Pull Request 中包含的提交的日誌。

    The log of the commits included in this pull request.

  • 檢查

    Checks

    檢查的結果在提交時執行。這與也在“對話”選項卡底部執行和彙總的自動測試不同。

    The results of the checks run on the commit. This is different from the automated tests that are also run and summarized at the bottom of the Conversation tab.

  • 檔案已更改

    Files changed

    此請求對程式碼所做的更改。在此選項卡中，你可以在其中找到對 Pull Request 中更改的特定註釋。你也可以在此標籤中回覆這些評論。

    The changes this request makes to the code. In this tab is where you find specific comments to the changes in your pull request. You can reply to those comments in this tab, as well.

回覆評論link

Respond to a commentlink

如果你的 Pull Request 收到來自審閱者的評論，你可以用多種方式回覆。

If your pull request receives comments from a reviewer, you can respond in several ways.

  • 回覆反饋。

    Reply to the feedback.

    例如，你可以要求提供更多資訊或回覆解釋。

    For example, you can ask for more information or reply with an explanation.

  • 對審閱者建議的文件進行更改。

    Make the changes to the documentation that the reviewer recommends.

    如果你使用建議的更改更新工作分支，請解析註釋。

    If you update the working branch with the suggested changes, resolve the comment.

  • 對文件進行其他更改。

    Make other changes to the documentation.

    在檢視反饋後，你可能會看到更好的改進。透過你的改進來更新工作分支，並在評論中向審閱者解釋你選擇它的原因。

    After reviewing the feedback, you might see an even better improvement. Update the working branch with your improvement and explain why you chose that to your reviewers in a comment.

請記住，沒有收到對稽核註釋的響應的 Pull Request 被認為是被放棄並關閉。有關被放棄的 Pull Request 的更多資訊，請參閱被放棄的 Pull 請求會發生什麼。

Remember that pull requests that do not receive a response to a review comment are considered abandoned and closed. For more information about abandoned pull requests, see What happens to abandoned pull requests.

更新 Pull Request 中的檔案link

Update a file in the pull requestlink

請按照此過程更改 Pull Request 中的檔案或將新檔案新增到 Pull 請求中。

Follow this procedure to change a file in the pull request or to add a new file to the pull request.

  1. 在你的 git 工作區的工作目錄中，簽出你的工作分支。

    In your git workspace, in your working directory, checkout your working branch.

  2. 更新文件以響應你收到的反饋。用於修改文件主題的過程也用於在有開啟的 Pull Request 時更新文件。

    Update the documentation to respond to the feedback you received. The procedures used to revise a documentation topic are also used to update the documentation while there's an open pull request.

  3. 如測試文件更新中所述，在本地測試你的更新。

    Test your update locally as described in Testing a documentation update.

  4. 在你的更新經過測試後，提交你的更改並將新提交推送到 origin 伺服器上儲存庫的工作分支。

    After your updates have been tested, commit your changes and push the new commits to the working branch of your repo on your origin server.

  5. 在你更新 origin 伺服器上的工作分支（你的 GitHub 帳戶中 angular/angular 儲存庫的 fork）後，你的 Pull Request 會自動更新。

    After you update the working branch on your origin server, the fork of the angular/angular repo in your GitHub account, your pull request updates automatically.

  6. 在 Pull Request 更新後，會重新啟動自動測試並通知審閱者。

    After the pull request updates, the automated tests are restarted and the reviewers are notified.

根據需要重複此過程，以解決你從 Pull Request 審查中獲得的反饋。

Repeat this process as needed to address the feedback you get from reviews of the pull request.

清理分支link

Clean up the branchlink

如果你添加了提交來解決審查反饋，可能會要求你清理工作分支。如果你所做的某些提交只解決了審閱者的反饋，它們可能會被壓縮。壓縮提交將在多個提交中所做的更改組合到一個提交中。

If you added commits to address review feedback, you might be requested to clean up your working branch. If some of the commits you made address only review feedback from your reviewers, they can probably be squashed. Squashing commits combines the changes made in multiple commits into a single commit.

在工作分支中壓縮提交link

To squash commits in your working branchlink

從本地計算機上的命令列工具執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer.

  1. 在你的工作區目錄中的工作目錄中，簽出你的工作分支。

    In your workspace directory, in your working directory, checkout your working branch.

  2. 執行此命令以檢視工作分支中的提交。

    Run this command to view the commits in your working branch.

    git log --pretty=format:"%h %as %an %Cblue%s %Cgreen%D"

  3. 在前一個 git log 命令的輸出中，查詢包含 upstream/main 的條目。它應該在列表的頂部附近。

    In the output of the previous git log command, find the entry that contains upstream/main. It should be near the top of the list.

    1. 確認條目還包含 origin/main 和 main

      Confirm that entry also contains origin/main and main

      如果不是，你必須將本地計算機上的複製以及你的 personal/angular 儲存庫與 upstream 儲存庫重新同步。重新同步儲存庫後，請在繼續之前重新定位工作分支。

      If it doesn't, you must resync the clone on your local computer and your personal/angular repo with the upstream repo. After you resync the repos, rebase the working branch before you continue.

    2. 確認你的更新的所有提交都在包含 upstream/main 的條目之後

      Confirm that all commits for your update are after the entry that contains upstream/main

      請記住，日誌輸出會首先顯示最近的提交。你的提交應該都在日誌輸出中包含 upstream/main 的條目之上。如果你有包含 upstream/main 的條目之後列出的提交，則你在工作分支中的提交會以某種方式混淆。你必須在嘗試壓縮任何提交之前修復分支。

      Remember that the log output is displayed with the most recent commit first. Your commits should all be on top of the entry that contains upstream/main in the log output. If you have commits that are listed after the entry that contains upstream/main, somehow your commits in the working branch got mixed up. You must fix the branch before you try to squash any commits.

  4. 計算包含 upstream/main 的條目頂部的行數。例如，在此日誌輸出中，工作分支名稱是 update-doc-contribution，並且在包含 upstream/main 的條目之上有五個提交條目。

    Count the lines that are on top of the entry that contains upstream/main. For example, in this log output, the working branch name is update-doc-contribution and there are five commit entries that are on top of the entry that contains upstream/main.

  5. 執行此命令以壓縮在包含 upstream/main 的條目之後發生的提交。在你的命令中，將 HEAD 之後的 5 替換為包含 upstream/main 的條目頂部的提交數。

    Run this command to squash the commits that occurred after the entry that contains upstream/main. In your command, replace the 5 after HEAD with the number of commits on top of the entry that contains upstream/main.

    git rebase -i HEAD~5

  6. 此命令會開啟你的預設編輯器，其中包含你在 git rebase 命令中選擇的提交的條目。

    This command opens your default editor with entries for the commits that you selected in the git rebase command.

  7. 要壓縮提交，請編輯編輯器中顯示的檔案中的命令。編輯器中的命令從最舊到最新列出，這與 git log 命令列出它們的順序相反。可能的命令選項在命令下方的編輯器中列出。要壓縮你的 Pull Request 的提交，你只需要：pick 和 squash。

    To squash the commits, edit the commands in the file that's presented in the editor. The commands in the editor are listed from oldest to newest, which is the opposite order from how they are listed by the git log command. The possible command options are listed in the editor below the commands. To squash the commits for your pull request, you only need: pick and squash.

  8. 檢視編輯器中的命令並更改它們以符合你的意圖。

    Review the commands in the editor and change them to match your intention.

    命令會從上到下處理，即從最舊的提交到最近的提交。要合併此 Pull Request 中此分支中的所有提交，請將除了第一個提交之外的所有提交的 pick 命令更改為 squash。本文字顯示了它在此範例中的外觀。

    The commands are processed from top to bottom, that is from oldest commit to the most recent. To merge all commits in this branch for this pull request, change the pick commands to squash for all commits except for the first one. This text shows how this looks for this example.

    pick bb0ff71891 docs: update of documentation contrib. guide squash c040d76685 docs: more content for doc updates squash 472585c43f docs: fix links that were broken by renamed files squash 3e6f4c73ac docs: add more info about open PR squash 8e50fad064 docs: more pr docs

    透過此編輯，git rebase 會選擇第一個提交併將後提交的合併到第一個提交中。

    With this edit, git rebase picks the first commit and combines the later commits into the first one.

    使用 pick 命令的提交的提交訊息是用於結果提交的提交訊息。確保它的格式正確並以 docs: 開頭。如果你需要更改提交訊息，可以在編輯器中編輯它。

    The commit message of the commit with the pick command, is the commit message used for the resulting commit. Make sure that it in the correct format and starts with docs:. If you need to change the commit message, you can edit it in the editor.

  9. 更新命令後，儲存並退出編輯器。git rebase commit 會處理這些命令並更新你工作區中的提交日誌。在此範例中，rebase 命令結合了五個提交，以在你的工作分支中建立一個提交。這是 rebase 命令完成後的提交日誌。

    After you update the commands, save and exit the editor. The git rebase commit processes the commands and updates the commit log in your workspace. In this example, the rebase command combined the five commits to create a single commit in your working branch. This is the commit log after the rebase command completes.

  10. git rebase 命令會更改本地計算機中的提交日誌，因此它現在與你的線上儲存庫中的不同。要更新你的線上儲存庫，你必須使用此命令強制從本地計算機推送更改。

    The git rebase command changes the commit log in your local computer so it is now different from the one in your online repo. To update your online repo, you must force your push of changes from your local computer using this command.

    git push --force-with-lease

    此操作也稱為強制推送，因為它會更改儲存在你 GitHub 帳戶中的提交日誌。通常，當你執行 git push 時，你會將新提交新增到線上儲存庫。當其他人 fork 儲存庫時，強制推送可能會對他們產生不良影響。此 force-push 是到你的 fork 儲存庫的，不應該共享，因此應該沒問題。

    This action is also called a force push because it changes the commit log that was stored in your GitHub account. Normally, when you run git push, you add new commits to the online repo. When other people have forked a repo, a force push can have undesired effects for them. This force-push is to your forked repo, which should not be shared, so it should be OK.

  11. 在你的強制推送更新線上儲存庫後，你的 Pull Request 會重新啟動自動測試並通知審閱者此更新。

    After your force push updates the online repo, your pull request restarts the automated tests and notifies the reviewers of the update.

下一步link

Next stepslink

根據需要重複這些更新步驟，以回覆你收到的所有反饋。

Repeat these update steps as necessary to respond to all the feedback you receive.

在你解決所有反饋並且你的 Pull Request 被批准後，它會合併到 angular/angular。你的 Pull Request 中的更改應該很快出現在文件中。

After you address all the feedback and your pull request has been approved, it is merged into angular/angular. The changes in your pull request should appear in the documentation shortly afterwards.

在你的 Pull Request 合併到 angular/angular 後，你可以清理你的工作區。

After your pull request is merged into angular/angular, you can clean up your workspace.

最後複查時間：10/12/2022
